title: Spymaster

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, pick a target to be a guesser the following night, and come up with a clue. You cannot pick the same player twice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you will be assigned a board of 16 roles. 8 of them will be roles in the game, and the 7 won’t (but are theoretically possible to be rolled in the game). There is also 1 assassin role that is not in the game. You know which is which, and must get players to guess the roles that are in the game.
- When giving a clue, it may only consist of one word, and a number. The number indicates how many roles the clue to relevant to.
- If a Guesser makes an incorrect guess, they cannot make any more guesses, and will be unable to act tonight, so the order matters.
- If a Guesser chooses the assassin, they will be dealt a basic attack at the end of the night, and you will lose instantly, unless you’ve already won.
- If a Guesser gets all the relevant roles related to the clue, they may perform two night actions tonight. They may also make a free additional guess, which has no repercussions, unless they hit the assassin.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value:
- Feedback on if guesses were correct or incorrect are given immediately, not at the end of the night.
- You are not allowed to talk about your knowledge of which roles are in the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get at least 6 roles that are in the game to be successfully guessed.
